bengaliName: বিনো থ্রি ডি অ্যাডভেঞ্চারাস জু বই ১ পিস
longDesc:
Bino Zoo is a box of animal introduction. Children will be able to recognize 30 animals and get to know some basic information of those animals. Through our Bino application, they can enjoy the movement of animals and their sounds as well.  There are 30 cards in the box. 10 birds, 10 fishes & 10 animals. Every card represents an individual animal with some information. If you scan 2 of our cards together they will interact each other.

What is inside: 30 Flash Cards
Materials: Paper cards
Color: Multy
name: Bino 3D Adventurous Zoo Book 1 Pcs

bengaliName: বিনো থ্রি ডি অ্যাডভেঞ্চারাস প্ল্যানেট বুক ১ পিস
longDesc:
Bino Planet is a flashcard collection of planets. It contains total of 10 cards of planets and instruction. Every planet will appear in reality with the information sound through the Bino application. The information of the planets are also given at the back of each planet’s cards. 
Not only kids but also elders can also enjoy this book who seeks knowledge about space. Through various animation, we tried to create a virtual world of space in which children can see the whole scenario of the solar system.
The most fun fact in this book is, if we put all the 9 cards together, it will form a big picture of whole solar system and user can enjoy the whole solar system in a reality view through our application in their smart phone or Tab. 

What is inside: 10 Flash cards with instruction.
Materials: Paper card with Matte lamination. 
Color: Multy
name: Bino 3D Adventurous Planet Book 1 Pcs

bengaliName: বিনো থ্রি ডি অ্যাডভেঞ্চারাস ইংলিশ বুক ১ পিস
longDesc:
Bino English is an interactive Book for learning English Alphabets from A to Z. Our English book is more 3D adventurous and more realistic to give children a Magical experience with Fun learning. Your child can practice english alphabets though our application. With the Bino Application, the pictures of our Bino books will come alive and the sound will help your kids learn more effectively than usual

What is inside: 29 pages 
Materials: Art paper with Matte Lamination
name: Bino 3D Adventurous English Book 1 pcs

bengaliName: বিনো থ্রি ডি অ্যাডভেঞ্চারাস বাংলা বই ১ পিস
longDesc:
Bino Bangla is an interactive Book for learning Bangla alphabets. Our Bangla book is more 3D adventurous and more realistic to give children a Magical experience with Fun learning. Your child can practice bangla alphabets though our application. With the Bino Application, the pictures of our Bino books will come alive and the sound will help your kids learn more effectively than usual.

What is inside: 55 pages 
Materials: Art paper with Matte Lamination
name: Bino 3D Adventurous Bangla Book 1 pcs

longDesc: Goofi published its first 5-book series for teaching empathy, moral values and ethics to children through combination of storytelling and doodling. The books are interactive and children can do doodling on the pages. The book series is for children between 4-10 years old. Individual parents and pre-school, daycare can purchase the series for their home and institution.
name: Goofi Storydoo Series 1 pcs

longDesc:
Goofi Puppet is ‘hand puppet’ made for role play and imaginary game.
Children and adults can play and interact with them to teach various things
to each other – like telling a story or acting different roles.
Each puppet comes in a packet that is designed in a way that children can
make various masks and badge. There are 8 masks and 6 badges in the
packet alone.
The puppets are handmade and available at limited edition with the best
materials for children.
Goofi Puppets are wonderful product for pre-school children both at home
and at schools for parents and teachers to use, interact and play with each
other.
name: Goofi Puppet- Mr Bluetooth 1 pcs

longDesc:
Goofi Drawing series is a combination of 4 books: Goofi Shape Artist, Goofi
Doodle Book, Goofi Design Book and Kids Time design book.
Art, drawing, design, doodle – combination of all 4 of these techniques for
children are covered in this series. The series helps 3-8 years old children
to develop their drawing, art skill and creativity, critical thinking.
Benefits of Goofi Drawing Series:
1. Learning art, doodle, drawing, design
2. Improve creativity, motor skill and concentration
3. 100+ hours of engagement for children
4. Reduce smart phone addiction
name: Goofi Drawing Series 1 pcs

longDesc:
Goofi Math Series introduces basic concepts of math to children through
various creative, innovative activities and engagement. It makes math for
fun and interesting for children. The series is for 3-6 years old children. It
helps children to learn numbers, counting, addition and subtraction. The
series is also part of many school’s curriculum in Bangladesh.
name: Goofi Math Series 1 pcs

longDesc:
Goofi Play with Alphabet series is the first step towards learning English
through various creative activities and engagement. There are total 8 books
in this series. Each page is filled with maize, drawing, brain game along
with alphabet, word learning etc. The series is also part of many school’s
curriculum in Bangladesh.
Benefits of Goofi Play with Alphabet:
1. Learning English
2. Improve creativity
3. 150+ hours of engagement for children
4. Coloring/drawing learning
5. Reduce smart phone addiction
name: Goofi Play With Alphabet 1 pcs

longDesc:
About the author (2019)

After studying creative writing at Oberlin College and the University of East Anglia, Dr Numair Atif Choudhury did a PhD from the University of Texas, Dallas. He had been working on Babu Bangladesh!, his epic first novel, for nearly fifteen years. Soon after completing the final draft, he passed away in an accident in 2018.

Bangladesh, 2028. A biographer begins to document the life of an enigmatic and controversial political luminary - Babu, also known as 'Babu Bangladesh'. In unearthing the story of a man whom many thought was the leader of his generation, he begins to uncover the story of a nation itself. Buildings acquire consciousness to chart political outcomes, a tree stands defiantly even as marauding troops try to blast it out of existence, tribes of snake and tree worshipers compete for regional supremacy, even as fish-humanoids emerge from the waters ... Flitting between fantasy and reality, manoeuvring through the rainforest swamps of Bangladesh with as much ease as the immigrant colonies of New York, blurring the boundaries between myth, history and truth, Babu Bangladesh! is a work of stunning scope and ambition from the most exciting literary voice to emerge from the Subcontinent in years.
name: Babu Bangladesh!
